description: Just a Mineral waters

title: Breadballs Marinara
description: Terjunlah ke kenikmatan yang tak terbantahkan dengan Ultimate Cheese Steak kami. Daging sapi panggang yang lembut dan juicy disajikan dengan potongan bawang dan paprika yang digoreng sempurna, semuanya dilumuri oleh lapisan tebal keju cheddar dan mozzarella yang melumer. Setiap gigitan adalah perpaduan sempurna dari rasa gurih dan lembut, membuat setiap orang kembali meminta lebih.

title: Chicken Teriyaki
description: Irresistible teriyaki glazed chicken strips.

title: Steak & Cheese
description: Inspired by the hoagie that made Philadelphia famous, our version of the Cheese Steak features mouth-watering slices of lean and tender steak with sautéed onions and green peppers topped with melted cheese. Its served hot with your choice of fresh vegetables and condiments on freshly baked bread.

title: Chicken Slice
description: With succulent slices of Chicken ham, you can't beat this favorite. Especially as it's got under 6 grams of fat.

title: Spicy Italian
description: Spice up your life with some real flavor. Served on freshly baked bread and toasted to perfection, the Spicy Italian sandwich features spicy pepperoni and delicious slices of salami. For a more personalized taste, add fresh peppers, oil, vinegar or anything else to suit your liking.

title: Chicken Slices
description: A classic sandwich with pepperoni, salami, and ham.

title: Chicken Fish Wrap
description: Oven-roasted turkey breast with your choice of fresh veggies.

title: Chicken Teriyaki Wrap
description: A delight for veggie lovers with fresh vegetables and your choice of condiments.

description: Tender chicken strips in a savory teriyaki glaze.

title: Veggie Delight Sandwich
description: A delightfully crunchy fresh combination of garden fresh lettuce, tomatoes, green peppers, onions, olives and pickles and your choice of condiments served on freshly baked bread. It’s like a salad sandwich.

title: Roast Beef
description: A classic favorite, comprises of lean and tender sliced roast beef with your choice of fresh vegetables and condiments served on freshly baked bread.

title: Italian B.M.T.
description: An old world favourite sandwich that is made up of beef salami, beef pepperoni and chicken ham. Some say B.M.T.™ stands for biggest, meatiest, tastiest.

title: BBQ Chicken Strips
description: The New BBQ Chicken Sandwich consist of tender chicken strips paired with sweet and tangy St.louis style BBQ sauce, fresh lettuce,tomatoes, red onions and pickles on your choice of toasted bread.

title: Chicken Teriyaki
description: An Asian classic, is made with tender chicken pieces dressed lightly with teriyaki sauce, served hot and topped with your choice of fresh vegetables and condiments on freshly baked bread.

title: Bulgogi Chicken
description: Switch out your usual cheese with Mozzarella to get that K-fry stretch! Korean flavours of Bulgogi, enveloped in stretchy Mozzarella - a sub combination out of this world.

title: Roasted Chicken
description: Feel peckish for chicken? Then try our Oven Roasted Chicken Breast. A tender, boneless chicken breast patty roasted to perfection, with your choice of fresh vegetables and condiments is served on freshly baked bread. Just like mom used to make.

title: Seafood Sensation
description: Sweet, tender chunks of seafood blended with creamy light mayonnaise to make a delightfully delicious sub, served with your choice of vegetables & condiments on freshly baked bread

title: Egg Mayo
description: A simple recipe anyone will love with a thick spread of chopped up boiled egg mixed with creamy rich mayonnaise.

title: BBQ Chicken
description: Turn your favorite SUBWAY® meats and veggies into a mouth-watering salad made just the way you want it. Top it with ranch dressing or light Italian for a flavourful, satisfying meal.
